SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.listeners.ModelSubject
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Game extends ModelSubject implements Serializable
Game class represents the main logic of MyShelfie. It creates the game throw methods: createPlayers, createBag that refills the bag with the items, generatePersonalObjCards that distributes one of the personal objective cards to each player of the match, generateCommonObjCards that creates the two objective cards of the match, refillGameBoard that refills the game board when necessary, setter and getter.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(int playersNumber) throws InvalidNumberOfPlayersException, RemoteException
      constructor for Game class
      Parameters:
      playersNumber - the number of players in a game
      Throws:
      InvalidNumberOfPlayersException - if number of players entered is less than two or more than four
      RemoteException - if the creation of the game board goes wrong

  • Method Details

    • generatePersonalObjCards

      public void generatePersonalObjCards()
      Method generatePersonalObjCards obtains from a cardReader instance a list of personalObj card previously store in a Json file and the distribute one of them to each player of the match.
